meanings.sent1: Grandma outlives her friends due to her healthy lifestyle.
meanings.sent2: The tortoise outlives the hare in the famous fable.
meanings.sent3: The ancient tree outlives the new saplings in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Love outlives all hardships and challenges.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of kindness outlives any act of cruelty.

meanings.sent1: The ruins of the castle outlives the memories of its former glory.
meanings.sent2: Traditions often outlive the generations that started them.
meanings.sent3: The old library outlives the need for printed books.
meanings.sent4: The beauty of nature outlives any man-made creation.
meanings.sent5: The impact of a good deed outlives the moment it was done.
